name: Askcord
description:
Join an online UX Design community and make your way in it.
You can interact with other members the way that fits best your personality. 

Just remember... it's all about building a community!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Features:

45 users to interact with. 4 different responses per message. Enough content to keep you playing a few rounds until you reach the max score (or the lowest ;)!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

This game was created from scratch in one week for the 'Design Buddies Game Jam'.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UX Researcher/Writer Karen Kohtz UX Researcher/Writer Christina Vuong | TwitterMusician Michelle Lugo | Instagram Programmer Tottori

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Icons by:

Yoyo from Noun Project
NYY from Noun Project
Neha Tyagi from Noun Project

Fonts:
Hattori Hanzo
Magos by NimbleBeasts Collective

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fullscreen recommended.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
